content: Sorry, toby, call us when you’re grown up, educated, understand the real world & not just following blindly what your ignorant parents are pumping into you. To the rest of the liberal Trump haters, the wall will be funded by tax payers & paid back by taxes on imports. S T F U and give Trump a chance to make America GREAT Again! He needs a little time to undo all the tearing down & destroying of America barry did! You can’t fix stupid overnight!
